desc:

•	Dual-View Video
•	Ultra Night Video

•	Battery capacity：5000 mAh Battery
•	SIM Card Type: Nano Dual-Sim
•	Qualcomm Snapdragon 662
•	Fingerprint Sensor & AI Face Unlock
•	RAM：6GB RAM + 128GB ROM
•	ColorOS 11.1 Based on Android 11

AMOLED FHD+ Screen size: 6.43”
Resolution: 2400*1080 with Mini Punch-Hole. The tiny 3.688mm punch-hole and super-thin 1.60mm bezels brings larger screen-to-body ratio.

33W Flash Charge
Quick charge in a short time with 15min charging to 30% Power, 30min charging to 54% Power and 72min charging to the phone being fully charged.

Large 5000mAh Battery
The phone with the longest battery life in the same price range with a 5000 mAh Battery large battery.

What’s in the box?
Handset*1, Charger*1, USB Data Cable*1, SIM Ejector Tool*1, Protective Case*1, Screen Protector F

Mobil 1™ FS x1 5W-50 is made with a proprietary blend of high performance synthetic base stocks fortified with a precisely balanced component system providing:
